roadweaver.midnightconfig.initialLocatin: Number of structures to locate on world load
Select the number of structures to locate on world load. Higher number = longer loading time
roadweaver.midnightconfig.maxLocatingCou: Maximum number of structures to locate
Select the maximum number of structures to locate dynamically. Higher number = more memory usage
roadweaver.midnightconfig.structureToLoc: Select or type the structure you want to locate. E.g., #minecraft:village, minecraft:village_plains or modid:custom_structure. Allows structure tags and keys.
roadweaver.midnightconfig.averagingRadiu: Amount of terrain averaging done for artificial roads
roadweaver.midnightconfig.allowArtificia: Whether artificial roads are allowed to generate
roadweaver.midnightconfig.allowNatural.t: Whether natural roads are allowed to generate
roadweaver.midnightconfig.placeWaypoints: Disables road generation in favor of waypoint generation
roadweaver.midnightconfig.maxHeightDiffe: Maximum height difference allowed for roads. Higher values allow steeper roads. Default: 5
roadweaver.midnightconfig.maxTerrainStab: Terrain stability threshold. Higher values allow rougher terrain. Default: 4
roadweaver.midnightconfig.maxConcurrentR: Maximum number of roads that can be generated simultaneously. Lower values reduce performance impact but slow down road generation. Default: 3
roadweaver.midnightconfig.title: RoadWeaver
gui.roadweaver.debug_map.title: RoadWeaver - Debug Map
